alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Van Buren and northwestern Cleburne Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sugar Loaf Recreation Area, or near Fairfield Bay, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Edgemont... Prim... Dam Site Marina... Hill Creek Recreation Area... Brownsville... Eden Isle... South Fork Recreation Area... Narrows Marina... Woodrow... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
